original_text: If a man is too lazy to work on his house, its roof will fall down. Rain will make his rooms wet. If a man is too lazy to work on his house, its roof will fall down. korean_text: 게으른즉 서까래가 내려앉고 손을 놓은즉 집이 새느니라

sentences.original_text: If a man is too lazy to work on his house
sentences.korean_translation: 만약 어떤 사람이 그의 집에서 일하기가 너무 게으르면

sentences.original_text: Rain will make his rooms wet
sentences.korean_translation: 비가 그의 방들을 젖게 할 것이다
